moreBlocks.lawyersAtWickesLaw,PLLCSelectedForASuper: • Wickes, Paul O. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
At Wickes Law, PLLC, we partner with our clients to meet their litigation needs. No matter the predicament, we have the experience and flexibility to achieve a desire result. Whether that goal is a quick, cost-effective settlement or a no-stone-unturned fight to the end, Wickes Law, PLLC has the skill sets needed. That is, we can be efficient peacemakers or, on the other hand, we have the intellect, experience, and tenacity to win at trial and on appeal.

Wickes Law, PLLC provides your business sophisticated legal work commonly expected from a prestigious, international firm, but with the efficiencies, client loyalty, and individualized service of a small one.

Our practice focuses on complex commercial litigation, rail transportation litigation, railroad grade crossing suits, FELA claims, trucking claims, product liability suits, environmental litigation, occupational injuries; toxic tort, intellectual property suits, and defense of significant personal injury claims.
